expose.title: Expose Your Friends
lines:
Who is most likely to black out in Smashed?
Let’s help them {drink} {amount}

If you are right they {drink} {amount}

They {drink} {amount}

{drink} {amount}

Take off an article of clothing and {drink} {amount}

This whore should {drink} {amount}

I feel sorry for you {drink} {amount}

You need to get over them and {drink} {amount}

Reveal it or {drink} {amount}

Brag about it to everyone and {drink} {amount}

Your breeding kink deserves {drink} {amount}

Stop being so picky and {drink} {amount}

Tell another player you love them or {drink} {amount}

You should both {drink} {amount}

Who would you trust the least with a newborn baby?
You monster {drink} {amount}

In the event of a zombie apocalypse, who would sacrifice everyone here to save themselves?
Everyone but them {drink} {amount}

Who would be the next person to get punched in the face?
Let someone punch you or {drink} {amount}

Who’s the most likely to become a liability after two drinks?
Such a lightweight deserves {drink} {amount}

Who would get a tattoo they will later regret?
They {drink} {amount}

Which player is most likely to steal from their employer?
They {drink} {amount}

Whose funeral will have the smallest attendance?
You lonely lonely soul {drink} {amount}

Who would be the least funny stand up comedian?
Tell everyone your best joke or {drink} {amount}

Who is the most likely to create a scam business?
They {drink} {amount}

In their lifetime, who has made the least positive impact on the human species?
Don’t worry we all think that as well {drink} {amount}

Who is the most likely to sell out their family and friends for fame?
They {drink} {amount}

Who is most likely to commit a hit and run?
They {drink} {amount}

Which avatar is the biggest e-boy?
Find someone to sit on your lap or {drink} {amount}

Which avatar is the biggest e-girl?
Sit on someone's lap or {drink} {amount}

Which player secretly fakes their drinks?
They should {drink} {amount} x2 to make up for it

Who would be the worst adultous phone operator?
Talk dirty to another player or {drink} {amount}

Who would have sexual intercourse for the least amount of money?
Your parents are already disappointed in you don't worry {drink} {amount}

Which player is least likely to tell their new sexual partner they have an STD?
They {drink} {amount}

Who is most likely to marry someone for money?
They {drink} {amount}

Who should be banned from creating offspring?
I can’t blame you, they should {drink} {amount}

Who is most likely to cock block a friend?
Cock block someone or {drink} {amount}

Who would most likely pay for an e-relationship?
Open tinder and swipe right on ten random people or {drink} {amount}

Who’s the last person you would want to be trapped in an elevator with?
Both players {drink} {amount} to get over that.

Who thinks they are more attractive than they actually are?
Such a narcissist deserves {drink} {amount}

Who would most likely shoot themselves by accident?
Oops you accidently {drink} {amount}

Who’s parents are disappointed in them playing VRChat?
Don't worry we're not suprised either {drink} {amount}

Which player is most likely to stalk their new love interest?
If you are interested in someone in the room stand behind them or {drink} {amount}

Give a speech about a random player or {drink} {amount}

Tell the room what is was or {drink} {amount}

Who is most likely to murder their spouse for insurance money?
{drink} {amount}

Who has probably successfully blackmailed someone?
They {drink} {amount}

That was a bad idea they should {drink} {amount} x2 to make up for it.

They should block another player for the night or {drink} {amount}

They {drink} {amount}

They {drink} {amount}

You should spend the money on alcohol and {drink} {amount}

You champion we are all so proud of you {drink} {amount}

Ew, just ew {drink} {amount}

They need to stop clout chasing and {drink} {amount}

We can make them consume double to speed this up {drink} {amount} x2 you will need it.

Aww subby wubby, let the most dommy person in the room give you {drink} {amount}

We all know it won’t happen so {drink} {amount}

Reveal what you cummed to or {drink} {amount}

Let’s see if we can get them cross faded

Don’t worry no one would want to see it anyway {drink} {amount}

They need to say how many or {drink} {amount}

They should expose the person's name or {drink} {amount}

Don’t worry we all do it. {drink} {amount}

Don’t worry it’s your first time {drink} {amount}

Who would not get a joke?
Yikes don’t worry we all laugh at you anyway {drink} {amount}

Damn you are desperate {drink} {amount}

Real gangsta like you deserves {drink} {amount}
